name: Spirits of Carter Mansion
description:
Oh no! You've just kicked your favourite ball into the gigantic abandoned manor across the street! In a moment of bravery you venture inside to retrieve, but slowly begin to regret it. Journey around the house, uncovering its twisted halls, and sinister secrets whilst trying to escape with your beloved prize!

Navigate each room of the house with your eyes open and watch your bravery diminish, or close your eyes and be safe, but lost wandering around the expansive corridors of the estate. Find yourself unlocking great secrets to the haunted house's past to help you navigate through safely!

-Navigate using a classic North, East, South, West system akin to Zork
-Explore several room with unique art as you bravely peek through your fingers;
-Or instead close your eyes to wander around lost, but safely!
-Uncover parts of the history of the Carter Mansion as you explore
-Unlock different tool to help you navigate the house, including a nameable Cat companion that warns you of danger!
-Lots of little secrets to discover as you try and complete all of the diary pages and unlock all the achievements!
